name: Expedite
description:
Welcome to EXPEDITE game page!

The game for those who love 8-bit race games with top view. Written in Java

Features:

Auto generated traffic that never repeated.

10 levels and 5 gears for the best speed.

Police helicopter who controlls violations on the road.

Smart damage system.

Favourite music from one of the best games from the past: Super Spy Hunter 2 (NES)

(NOTE) So far this is an alpha version with early access
